#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

const int lmt = 5000005;
int z[lmt];

void z_function(string s) {
    int n = (int) s.length();
    for (int i = 1, l = 0, r = 0; i < n; ++i) {
        if (i <= r)
            z[i] = min (r - i + 1, z[i - l]);
        while (i + z[i] < n && s[z[i]] == s[i + z[i]])
            ++z[i];
        if (i + z[i] - 1 > r)
            l = i, r = i + z[i] - 1;
    }
    return ;
}

int main(){
    int q;
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    z_function(s);
    int n = s.size();
    scanf("%d",&q);
    while(q--){
        int x;
        scanf("%d",&x);
        int ans = min({x,n-x,z[x]});
        printf("%d\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
